Text: RENo Tracking number Hi Kevin Thanks for your email Only Referrals that were initiated on the Referral Station would have tracking information available online My company Referral Networks hosts Enrons Referral Station website For Referrals that were made prior to the online system being live May th you would need to contact the Employee Referral Manager at Enron to answer your questions Whatever avenue you used before to check on your Referrals I would still use for this particular one since it was made in the past prior to our live date If you have questions you might try the Enron Recruitment Technology Help Desk at select option I hope this answers your question If you have any future questions about using the online Referral Station please let us know Thanks Referral Networks Customer Support Original Message In April I submitted a candidate Ms Stacy Fitzgerald for two jobs and I also spoke with the hiring supervisor Mr Derryl Cleaveland regarding the candidate and the positions Stacy was subsequently interviewed for and began working for Enron on May My referral submission was on paper not electronically Am I eligible for the finders fee I could not find anything on the Tracking part of the web site thanks for the help Kevin Hyatt
